holidays.title: National Frozen Yogurt Day
holidays.description: You scream, I scream, we all scream for...Frozen Yogurt?  Yes!

holidays.title: International Day of Zero Tolerance to Female Genital Mutilation
holidays.description: Will you join the global community’s fight to end female genital mutilation? Find out how.

holidays.title: National Ashley Day
holidays.description: Ashley is one of those rare names that has a timeless and graceful appeal.

holidays.title: National Chopsticks Day
holidays.description: Time to test your chopstick-wielding skills. Use them to eat, stir, and serve your next meal.

holidays.title: National Lame Duck Day
holidays.description: All types of political lame ducks get our attention on National Lame Duck Day!

holidays.title: National Sickie Day
holidays.description: The first Monday of every February is when most workers are likely to call in sick.

holidays.title: National Valentine Shopping Reminder Day
holidays.description: The day reminds people to buy Valentine's gifts a week and a day ahead of time.

holidays.title: Oatmeal Monday
holidays.description: Get your pan ready and the fire going — we are making Oatmeal Monday come to life.

holidays.title: Pay a Compliment Day
holidays.description: Be the reason someone smiles today and experience the contagious energy of happiness.

holidays.title: Reclaim Social Day
holidays.description: On Reclaim Social Day, share your cheerful stories because we are in dire need of them.

holidays.title: Ronald Reagan Day
holidays.description: Let’s honor the man who ignited one of the strongest periods of economic growth.

holidays.title: Sami National Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate and recognize the Sámi people.

holidays.title: Time to Talk Day
holidays.description: Help raise awareness about mental health and be a part of changing the narrative.

holidays.title: Tu BiShvat
holidays.description: This is an ecological holiday to celebrate plants, trees, and everything green.

holidays.title: Waitangi Day
holidays.description: Get ready as we take a journey into New Zealand’s riveting past.

holidays.title: Bob Marley’s Birthday
holidays.description: His iconic music from ska to reggae, along with his wild dreadlocks, were his signature style.

holidays.title: Axl Rose’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rock star has done it all and paved the way for future generations.

holidays.title: Babe Ruth’s Birthday
holidays.description: This highly-awarded baseball player ate home runs for breakfast! Let us honor this remarkable individual.

holidays.title: Drita D'Avanzo’s Birthday
holidays.description: This beautiful reality star has opened her life for our scrutiny so today we celebrate her.

holidays.title: Ginny Lemon’s Birthday
holidays.description: The world is just a stepping stone to true greatness for this bubbly character.

holidays.title: Natalie Cole’s Birthday
holidays.description: From university degrees to innumerable awards, this singer certainly deserved her fame.

holidays.title: Rick Astley’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this vibrant singer, the world is still his oyster. Let’s celebrate him!

holidays.title: Ronald Reagan’s Birthday
holidays.description: This ex-Hollywood actor turned POTUS can rest in peace knowing he achieved the highest feat.

holidays.title: Zsa Zsa Gabor’s Birthday
holidays.description: From pageant queen to renowned star of the silver screen, Zsa Zsa did it all!
